title: Understanding the Universe Inside You
cleaned_text: There is a vast and complicated universe inside each one of us, and it dictates the conditions of the universe outside of us, that we interact with, daily. Randy Veitenheimer explains the steps we can take to transcend into one of the highest states of consciousness that can be achieved in this life. It comes down to understanding the importance of conflict as a means of transcending the negative and engage more in the positive.
